thread.title: BRIEF-Extended Stay America Hotels Launches Myesa Associate Engagement App

title: BRIEF-Extended Stay America Hotels Launches Myesa Associate Engagement App

organizations.name: engagement app reuters staff    extended stay america inc

text:
April 23, 2018 / 8:31 PM / Updated 7 minutes ago BRIEF-Extended Stay America Hotels Launches Myesa Associate Engagement App Reuters Staff 
  Extended Stay America Inc: 
* EXTENDED STAY AMERICA HOTELS LAUNCHES MYESA ASSOCIATE ENGAGEMENT APP 
* EXTENDED STAY AMERICA INC - NEW APP ALLOWS EXTENDED STAY AMERICA TO SHARE INFORMATION IMMEDIATELY WITH OVER 8,500 ASSOCIATES Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
